title: permbanned for 1 game i went off in
body:
hey guys i was just perma banned for 1 normal game where i wasnt really flaming extremely or insulting anyone’s person but rather defending myself against their sulk on how - i didnt gank and im supposed to do that before scutlers even respawn which is when they died and started flaming-
anyway thats not the point i was still rude and went off and talked alot unnecesseraly.
anyway my point is why after months of reform and behaving and honor unlocking and even managing to almost reaching checkpoint 2 -was check point 1 for a long time and recieving honors continiously- and i go off in 1 sad drunken game and lose all the progress ive made ?
im going to provide context later since im posting this through phone and give u all the details in the reform card
i reached d4 with 63% winrate and was recieving at least 2 honors per game i dont understand why did that 1 game deserve my account to be completely erased ?

replies.body:
> hey guys i was just perma banned for 1 normal game

No. You were perma-banned because after 4 penalties you haven't changed your behvior. You were warned in your previous penalty that the next time would result in a permanent ban.

> where i wasnt really flaming extremely or insulting anyoneâ€™s person but rather defending myself against their sulk on how

You were literally the first person to type in that game, and it was a harassing statement. You then continued to harass people, not 'defend yourself' as you claim. Not that it would be an excuse in any case.

> i reached d4 with 63% winrate and was recieving at least 2 honors per game i dont understand why did that 1 game deserve my account to be completely erased ?

Because you've had previous penalties recently, and told the next would be a perma-ban. How many warnings do you think you should get? 

If you'd like further clarity you an post the chat logs for the community to give you feedback, or I can post them for you if you'd like me to.

This is a really, really late smite, but we'll take it!

post his response to me and compare them with each other then tell me who was being really rude and harassing the other.
i dare u post his chat log next to mine and see who was harassing who but i doubt you'll do it cuz then you'll have to ban him too ;)
if everyone cant handle criticism in a competitive team game and cant stand anyone saying anything to him calling something that stupid and simple harassment, then i suggest u leave the game instead of banning everyone u dont like because u cant take the stick out of ur buttocks , cuz ass is toxic :o

The people there already explained to you where you went wrong, so if you were hoping to find different answers (such as Yesmen ones) then you're out of luck here.

Chat logs would be great for us to actually comment on your behavior.

A perma-ban is issued usually after the player already had a recent 14-day ban (and the player was on thin ice from that point), or the player showed extremely poor behavior to warrant an escalation.

Your rank and the number of honors you were receiving is irrelevant. Neither your skill level in the game nor games where you didn't behave poorly change how responsible you are for games where you *do* behave poorly.
